Uses of Package
datastructure

  • Packages that use datastructure 
    Package Description
    datastructure
    This package contains the classes that define the model of the library.
    datastructure.actions
    This package contains the different implementations of the Action class.
    datastructure.operators
    This package contains the different implementations of the Operator class.
    datastructure.paths
    This package contains the different implementations of the Path class.
    datastructure.tools
    This package contains the different main types of Tools.
    datastructure.tools.pens
    This package contains the different implementations of the Pen class.
    datastructure.tools.texttools
    This package contains the different implementations of the TextTool class.
    exports
    This package contains all the classes dedicated to export the drawings
  • Classes in datastructure used by datastructure 
    Class and Description
    Drawing
    This abstract class is the base of all the model structure.
  • Classes in datastructure used by datastructure.actions 
    Class and Description
    Action
    This abstract class allows the user to easily add new types of actions (basic types being Draw, Fill, Insert and Labelise).
    Drawing
    This abstract class is the base of all the model structure.
    Path
    This class allows the user to easily add new paths (basic types being PolygonalPath and BezierCurve) If the user wants to add a new "export" mode (basic export modes are to SVG and to Java), they need to declare a new abstract method: public abstract void generateNewExportModePath(); The generateNewExportModePath method will have to be implemented for all paths.
    Tool
    This class allows the user to easily add new tools.
  • Classes in datastructure used by datastructure.operators 
    Class and Description
    Drawing
    This abstract class is the base of all the model structure.
    Operator
    This abstract class allows the user to easily add new operations (basic types being Sequence, Alternative, Loop).
  • Classes in datastructure used by datastructure.paths 
    Class and Description
    Path
    This class allows the user to easily add new paths (basic types being PolygonalPath and BezierCurve) If the user wants to add a new "export" mode (basic export modes are to SVG and to Java), they need to declare a new abstract method: public abstract void generateNewExportModePath(); The generateNewExportModePath method will have to be implemented for all paths.
  • Classes in datastructure used by datastructure.tools 
    Class and Description
    Tool
    This class allows the user to easily add new tools.
  • Classes in datastructure used by datastructure.tools.pens 
    Class and Description
    Tool
    This class allows the user to easily add new tools.
  • Classes in datastructure used by datastructure.tools.texttools 
    Class and Description
    Tool
    This class allows the user to easily add new tools.
  • Classes in datastructure used by exports 
    Class and Description
    Drawing
    This abstract class is the base of all the model structure.
